recipes.name: Garlic Lemon Chicken
recipes.description: A flavorful and delicious chicken recipe that is perfect for those with milk allergies.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: In a small bowl, mix together the minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper.
Place the chicken breasts in a resealable plastic bag and pour the marinade over them. Seal the bag and massage the marinade into the chicken.
Let the chicken marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.
Remove the chicken from the marinade and discard the excess marinade.
Grill the chicken for about 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing.
Serve the garlic lemon chicken with your favorite side dishes and enjoy!

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and simple salad made with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.
steps: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella cheese into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving plate, alternating between them.
Place a fresh basil leaf on top of each tomato and mozzarella slice.
Drizzle the olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately and enjoy!
